exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="auctionUISkin" width="480" height="660" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="AB_png"/>
	
	<e:Label id="lblGold" y="32" text="0" x="81" width="69" size="24" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblDiamond" y="33" text="0" x="282" size="24" width="71" textAlign="center"/>
	
	<e:Label id="lblMaxBid" y="202" text="0.00aa" x="275" width="105" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblLastBid" y="460" text="0.00aa" x="275" width="105" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblCurrentBid" y="377" text="0.00aa" x="275" width="105" textAlign="center"/>
	
	<e:Image id="imgThumb" width="373" height="27" x="59" y="302" source="Abar_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgFront" width="373" height="27" x="59" y="302" source="Abarfront_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Group id="grpTrack" width="50" height="50" x="50" y="280">
		<e:Image width="50" height="50" x="0" y="10" fillMode="clip" source="Abarbutton_png"/>
		<e:Label id="lblTrack" text="100%" x="3" y="27" size="16" textAlign="center" width="43" height="15"/>
	</e:Group>
	
	<e:Image id="imgBid" width="293" height="80" x="92" y="536" fillMode="clip" source="Abutton_png"/>
	<e:Button y="27" id="btnAddGold" x="163">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="add_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnAddDiamond" y="28" x="364">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="add_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button y="91" id="btnHelp" x="406">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Ahelp_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" source="helpx_png" x="441" y="-1" width="41" fillMode="clip" height="41"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="blockUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.21" enabled="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="buyAchieveUISkin" width="405" height="368" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="407" height="378" x="0" y="0" source="popwinB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBuyUseGold" width="125" height="75" x="56" y="273" source="buttoncoin_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBuyUseDiamond" y="273" height="75" fillMode="clip" width="125" x="223" source="buttondia_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblGold" text="0" x="89" y="310" size="24" width="73" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblDiamond" size="24" y="310" text="0" x="254" width="75" height="23" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" source="helpx_png" x="365" y="-1" fillMode="clip" width="41" height="41"/>
	<e:Image id="imgIcon" width="217" height="132" x="97" y="64" fillMode="clip" source="b1_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgProject" width="115" height="25" x="170" y="203" source="t1_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblLevel" x="52" y="233" text="000000" size="15" textAlign="right" width="121"/>
	<e:Label id="lblRatio" text="0.00aa" x="324" y="210" size="15" width="45" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

</e:Skin>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="firstChargeBonusUISkin" width="480" height="610" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="480" height="610" x="0" y="0" source="topup_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Button id="btnCharge" x="239" y="410" width="148" height="58">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="topupbutton_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnCancel" y="473" x="239">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="giftUISkin" width="467" height="608" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="467" height="608" x="0" y="0" source="giftB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	
	<e:Image id="imgPick1" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="62"  fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>

	<e:Image id="imgPick5" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="331" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick6" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="397" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>

	<e:Label id="lblOutputGift" size="20" y="476" text="00.0aa" x="209"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="guideUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="rcTop" width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" enabled="true"/>
	<e:Rect id="rcMiddle" width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" enabled="true"/>

	<e:Image id="imgBack" fillMode="clip" source="helpx_png" x="442" y="0" width="41" height="41"/>

	<e:Image id="imgSpeak" width="312" height="130" x="134" y="617" source="G1_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBonus" width="81" height="30" x="332" y="705" source="guidebutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="helpUISkin" width="455" height="655" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

	<e:Image id="imgReport" width="149" height="49" x="26" y="81" source="flag_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Scroller width="380" height="460" x="35" y="124">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group height="461">
				<e:Label id="lblContent" x="0" y="0" width="380" size="24" text=""/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="homeUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="imgBidAvatar" width="64" height="66" x="189" y="6" source="Ahide_png"/>	
	<e:Image id="imgAvatar" height="69" y="97" width="70" x="3" source="Ahide_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBg" height="800" width="480" x="0" y="0"  source="MPB_png" fillMode="clip"/>

	<e:Image width="480" height="93" x="0" fillMode="clip" bottom="2" source="MPbottombar_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblBidName" x="272" y="15" size="18" width="165" height="23"/>
	<e:Label id="lblName" y="71" x="7" size="18" height="23"/>
	<e:Label id="lblBidGold" x="310" y="49" width="133" size="24" height="22"/>

	<e:Label id="lblGold" text="0" x="11" y="189" size="20" width="64" textAlign="center" height="24"/>
	<e:Label id="lblDiamond" text="0" x="9" y="242" size="20" width="64" textAlign="center" height="24"/>
	<e:Label id="lblOutput" text="0" x="10" y="303" size="20" width="64" textAlign="center" height="24"/>
	
	<e:Scroller id="scrProjects" height="300" width="470" y="425" horizontalCenter="-2">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group id="grpProject">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout verticalAlign="top" gap="10"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
	
	<e:ToggleButton id="btnHome" x="12" y="732">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPmainpage_png" source.down="MPmainpageS_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="btnTool" x="243" y="732">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPtool_png" source.down="MPtoolS_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>	
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="btnAuction" x="128" y="732">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPauction_png" source.down="MPauctionS_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:Button id="btnGift" x="418" y="285">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPgift_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button y="98" id="btnHit" x="421">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPhit_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnHelp" x="418" y="356">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPquestion_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:ToggleButton id="btnRank" x="359" y="732">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MPrank_png" source.down="MPrankS_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:Label id="lblHit" text="59" x="432" y="140" size="16" width="23" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblTotalHits" text="x0" x="432" y="181" size="24"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge" width="48" height="54" x="419" y="219" source="MPtopup_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Button id="btnAddGold" x="87" y="184">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="add_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnAddDiamond" y="234" x="88">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="add_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	
	<e:Group id="grpAddGold" width="98" height="27" x="10" y="370">
		<e:Image id="imgAddGold" width="22" height="25" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="coineffect_png"/>
		<e:Label id="lblAddGold" text="0" x="23" y="2" size="20" textAlign="left" width="69" height="23" verticalAlign="justify"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="imgHit" width="53" height="32" x="83" y="281" fillMode="clip" source="effect_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgGift" width="20" height="20" x="449" y="287" fillMode="clip" source="red_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgMessage" width="117" height="57" x="318" y="66" source="massage_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgHasMessage" fillMode="clip" source="red_png" x="393" y="76" width="20" height="20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="projectListIRSkin" width="470" height="140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="140" width="470" x="0" y="0" source="Projectbar_png" fillMode="clip"/>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="toolUISkin" width="490" height="660" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="490" height="660" x="0" y="0" source="TB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" fillMode="clip" height="41" y="8" width="41" source="helpx_png" x="449"/>
	<e:Group width="410" height="80" x="38" y="65">
		<e:Image id="imgHit" width="86" height="85" x="-13" y="-3" fillMode="clip" source="Hit_png"/>
		<e:Image id="imgTime" height="85" y="-3" fillMode="clip" width="86" x="94" source="time_png"/>
		<e:Image id="imgTicket" x="282" y="-3" fillMode="clip" width="86" height="85" source="ticket_png"/>
		<e:Image id="imgVIP" height="85" y="-3" fillMode="clip" width="86" x="187" source="VIP_png"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="20"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="scrProjects" height="445" width="436" y="190" horizontalCenter="-2.5">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group id="grpProject">
				<e:layout>
					<e:TileLayout orientation="rows"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Label id="lblGold" text="0" textAlign="center" size="24" y="34" width="69" x="83"/>
	<e:Label id="lblDiamond" text="0" textAlign="center" size="24" y="35" width="80" x="275"/>
	<e:Button y="29" id="btnAddGold" x="165">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="add_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnAddDiamond" y="30" x="366">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="add_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>	
</e:Skin>

<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
	         source="button_up_png"
	         source.down="button_down_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
	         textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>
